import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { TextField, Grid, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import FavoriteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Favorite'; export default function GetDrinkScreen({ drink, qr, allowFavorite }) { var QRCode = require('qrcode.react') if (allowFavorite) { console.log("TRUE") } return
{drink}
}
